name: Redneck Redemption
description:
The Biker Gang has stolen all of Cleff's Blue Ram! A poor choice on their part, which will surely have them looking down the barrel of Cleff's trusty shotgun.

Blast em' all, and collect all of Cleff's Blue Ram scattered across 3 separate levels! But watch out. The Biker Gang is sure to whack Cleff if they see him, and gators are looking for some fresh redneck meat to chomp on!
